1:1 StartDocument(1.0, utf-8)
2:1 StartElement({urn:x}p:data [z=">"])
4:5 StartElement(a)
4:8 Characters("test")
4:12 EndElement(a)
5:5 StartElement(b)
5:8 Characters("kkss\" = ddd\' >")
5:22 EndElement(b)
6:5 Characters("<a>ddddd</b>!e3--><!-- ddckx")
9:5 StartElement(c)
9:5 EndElement(c)
10:5 Characters("<![CDATA[zzzz]]>")
12:1 EndElement({urn:x}p:data)
14:1 EndDocument
